Identify the strengths & weaknesses of your brand as seen through the eyes of your consumers. Find out what’s behind your company’s brand and commercial performance – and that of your competitors’. BrandVue Eating Out has wide coverage, with 150+ leading US eating out brands in the survey. We cover restaurants, pubs, fast casuals, cafes, fast food, grab & go, and delivery - both large scale national brands, and up-&-coming niche outlets.

Brand Attention

Up to the day view of the level of excitement and attention around each operator. Measures include net buzz, buzz noise, positive & negative buzz and advertising awareness.

Brand Health

Consistent tracking of all key measures of brand performance that include awareness, affinity, consideration, preference, advantage, image, and occasion.

Demand & Usage

The visitation and usage of each retailer by channel on an annual and monthly basis. Measures include monthly penetration, annual penetration, conversion and annual frequency.

Customer Experience

The level of customer satisfaction and advocacy for each operator amongst customers who have visited or bought in the last 3 months. Measures include satisfaction and advocacy, categories of food and drink consumed, spend, and influence metrics.
